Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I input the marking ruberic into the Ai software to highlight any areas I may have missed but trust the teacher more as they know the content and task.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Much prefer the teacher feedback as it's more personal
